title: Spintronics: Ultra-short spin waves in an astoundingly simple material

title_detail.value: Spintronics: Ultra-short spin waves in an astoundingly simple material

summary: Due to its potential to make computers faster and smartphones more efficient, spintronics is considered a promising concept for the future of electronics. A team of researchers has now successfully generated so-called spin waves much more easily and efficiently than was previously deemed possible.
